text: Working with Zuzen Foods had always been easy and communicating with William had always been great. He goes the extra mile to ensure his customers are happy and satisfied with their orders. Appreciate him so much. Quality products and reliable service, what more can I ask for? :) Highly recommended.

I'm a regular customer of Zuzen, and I've been consistently impressed with their cakes and pastries. Their salesman, William Kee, is exceptional - extremely efficient and courteous. He goes above and beyond to provide the samples we request, and even ensures that we receive the necessary Halal certification. His excellent service has made Zuzen a trusted supplier for us.

Zuzen had been competitive in its price. Most importantly, am met with excellent customer service from William, one of their account managers. His professional and dedication in addressing customers‚Äô needs is paramount to keeping loyal customers around. I‚Äôm more than grateful for his assistance rendered.

Definetly top notch customer service from William!

He was our salesperson for our corporate account and definitely a go to person!
Not only he went out his way to helped us but i will always receive consistent updates about their company promotion / new product launch, which i feel is very important in F&B industry.

William is truly a gem in the company üí™üèª

William from Zuzen Food has been my POC for food ordering and liaising. Amazing guy, goes way beyond to ensure my requests are being met and often keeps me updated on any changes and others. Definitely my go-to guy for food purchases, not to mention the wide variety of frozen foods and desserts that Zuzen offers. Definitely 10/10 recommended!
